titles.title: To require the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain lands under the jurisdiction of the Department of Agriculture to the City of Sumpter, Oregon.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Lands.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee by Voice Vote.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 104-308.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 160.

action.text: Mr. Cooley moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.

term.name: Liability for toxic substances pollution damages

bill.summary: 5/9/1995--Introduced. Requires the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain Department of Agriculture lands to the City of Sumpter, Oregon, for public use.
